Interface ReviewRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Review,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Review>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Review,Long>
@Repository public interface ReviewRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Review,Long>
Repository interface for performing CRUD and custom query operations on Review entities.

This repository manages all database interactions related to user reviews, including fetching, filtering, moderation, and aggregation of ratings data. It supports both public-facing review retrieval and backend moderation or analytics functionality for administrators.

Spring Data JPA automatically provides default CRUD methods such as findAll(), findById(), save(), and deleteById(), while the custom query methods defined here extend its functionality for HealthyAura’s review and reputation system.

Since:
2025-11-07
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • findVisibleByEateryOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query("SELECT r FROM Review r WHERE r.eatery = :eatery AND r.isDeleted = false AND r.isHidden = false ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC") List<Review> findVisibleByEateryOrderByCreatedAtDesc(@Param("eatery") Eatery eatery)
      Retrieves all visible (non-deleted and not hidden) reviews for a given eatery, sorted by creation date in descending order.

      This method is primarily used for displaying recent public reviews to end-users.

      Parameters:
      eatery - the Eatery entity for which reviews are retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of visible Review entities ordered by newest first

    • findByEateryAndUserAndIsDeletedFalse

      Optional<Review> findByEateryAndUserAndIsDeletedFalse(Eatery eatery, Users user)
      Finds a user’s active (non-deleted) review for a specific eatery.

      This is used to enforce the one-review-per-eatery policy or for editing an existing review.

      Parameters:
      eatery - the eatery being reviewed
      user - the user who submitted the review
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the review if found

    • findByUserAndIsDeletedFalse

      List<Review> findByUserAndIsDeletedFalse(Users user)
      Retrieves all active (non-deleted) reviews submitted by a given user.
      Parameters:
      user - the Users entity whose reviews are being fetched
      Returns:
      a list of the user’s visible Review entries

    • findByIsDeletedFalse

      List<Review> findByIsDeletedFalse()
      Retrieves all active (non-deleted) reviews in the database.

      Primarily used by admins for moderation and system maintenance tasks.

      Returns:
      a list of active Review entities

    • getAverageHealthScore

      @Query("SELECT AVG(r.healthScore) FROM Review r WHERE r.eatery = :eatery AND r.isDeleted = false AND r.isHidden = false") Double getAverageHealthScore(@Param("eatery") Eatery eatery)
      Calculates the average health score for a specific eatery, considering only visible (non-deleted and non-hidden) reviews.
      Parameters:
      eatery - the eatery whose health rating is being averaged
      Returns:
      the average health score as a Double, or null if no reviews exist

    • getAverageHygieneScore

      @Query("SELECT AVG(r.hygieneScore) FROM Review r WHERE r.eatery = :eatery AND r.isDeleted = false AND r.isHidden = false") Double getAverageHygieneScore(@Param("eatery") Eatery eatery)
      Calculates the average hygiene score for a specific eatery, considering only visible (non-deleted and non-hidden) reviews.
      Parameters:
      eatery - the eatery whose hygiene rating is being averaged
      Returns:
      the average hygiene score as a Double, or null if no reviews exist

    • getReviewCount

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(r) FROM Review r WHERE r.eatery = :eatery AND r.isDeleted = false AND r.isHidden = false") Long getReviewCount(@Param("eatery") Eatery eatery)
      Counts the total number of visible (non-deleted and non-hidden) reviews for an eatery.

      Used for displaying the total review count in recommendation and analytics modules.

      Parameters:
      eatery - the Eatery being queried
      Returns:
      the number of reviews as a Long

    • findRecentSubmissions

      @Query("SELECT r FROM Review r WHERE r.eatery = :eatery AND r.user = :user AND r.lastSubmissionDate >= :sevenDaysAgo") List<Review> findRecentSubmissions(@Param("eatery") Eatery eatery, @Param("user") Users user, @Param("sevenDaysAgo") LocalDateTime sevenDaysAgo)
      Retrieves all reviews submitted by a specific user for a given eatery within the last seven days (including deleted ones).

      This helps enforce the review submission cooldown policy, preventing repeated spam submissions.

      Parameters:
      eatery - the eatery being reviewed
      user - the user who submitted the review
      sevenDaysAgo - the date threshold (typically LocalDateTime.now().minusDays(7))
      Returns:
      a list of recent Review entities within the cooldown period

    • findByEateryOrderByHealthScoreDesc

      @Query("SELECT r FROM Review r WHERE r.eatery = :eatery AND r.isDeleted = false AND r.isHidden = false ORDER BY r.healthScore DESC, r.createdAt DESC") List<Review> findByEateryOrderByHealthScoreDesc(@Param("eatery") Eatery eatery)
      Retrieves reviews for an eatery sorted by the highest health score, followed by most recent submissions.
      Parameters:
      eatery - the Eatery being queried
      Returns:
      a list of Review entities sorted by descending health score

    • findByEateryOrderByHygieneScoreDesc

      @Query("SELECT r FROM Review r WHERE r.eatery = :eatery AND r.isDeleted = false AND r.isHidden = false ORDER BY r.hygieneScore DESC, r.createdAt DESC") List<Review> findByEateryOrderByHygieneScoreDesc(@Param("eatery") Eatery eatery)
      Retrieves reviews for an eatery sorted by the highest hygiene score, followed by most recent submissions.
      Parameters:
      eatery - the Eatery being queried
      Returns:
      a list of Review entities sorted by descending hygiene score

    • countReviewsCreatedTodayByUser

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(r) FROM Review r WHERE r.user = :user AND r.createdAt >= :startOfDay") Long countReviewsCreatedTodayByUser(@Param("user") Users user, @Param("startOfDay") LocalDateTime startOfDay)
      Counts the number of reviews created by a user since the start of the day.

      This supports a global daily review limit (e.g., 5 reviews/day) to prevent spam and ensure fair system usage.

      Parameters:
      user - the Users entity being checked
      startOfDay - the start of the current day (e.g., midnight timestamp)
      Returns:
      the number of reviews submitted by the user today
